title: Apple unveils new MacBook Pro with M1 Max chip and notch-less display
content: Apple has launched a new MacBook Pro with a 14-inch or 16-inch display, featuring the powerful M1 Max chip and a notch-less design.

title: Google announces new Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro smartphones
content: Google has unveiled its latest flagship smartphones, the Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro.

title: Facebook faces backlash over plans to launch Instagram for kids
content: Facebook's plans to launch an Instagram app for kids under the age of 13 have been met with widespread criticism.

title: Tesla reports record Q3 earnings, driven by strong Model 3 and Y sales
content: Tesla has announced record third-quarter earnings, reporting $1.62 billion in net income. The company's profits were driven by strong sales of the Model 3 and Model Y, which accounted for more than 90% of its total revenue.

title: Microsoft acquires AI startup Cognitivescale
content: Microsoft has announced the acquisition of Cognitivescale, a startup that specializes in artificial intelligence and machine learning. The move is expected to help Microsoft expand its offerings in the AI space and better compete with rivals like Google and Amazon.

title: Amazon unveils new Alexa-powered devices, including a robot for your home
content: Amazon has launched several new Alexa-powered devices, including a home robot called Astro. The robot can navigate your home and perform tasks like checking on pets or monitoring your home security.

title: Facebook's Oculus Quest 2 sales hit 10 million units
content: Facebook has announced that it has sold 10 million units of its Oculus Quest 2 virtual reality headset since its launch last year.
